comments:
My IDE version is 20020314. I started IDE without a workspace so it created it 
from scratch.
Then I checked out project from CVS. After that three tasks appeared in the the 
tasks pane. 
 1. The project was not built since its classpath is incomplete. Can not find 
the class file for java.lang.Object. Fix the classpath then try rebuilding this 
project
 2. This compilation unit indirectly references the missing type 
java.lang.Object (typically some required class file is referencing a type 
outside the classpath)
 3. Warning about that JRE_LIB was unbound, but it disappeared when I opened 
preferences dialog and moved to page Java->Installed JREs

Then I opened the project's properties dialog box and pressed "Capabilities" 
label it the tree.

At this point IDE said that internal error ocuured. Pressing details showed the 
following stacktrace.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at

(CapabilityRegistry.java:158)

When you the to press "OK" button in the project properties dialog the same 
exception raises.
Known problem that is fixed in the latest stable build
